sentences.en: As an asthmatic, he cannot cope with the heat and humidity.
sentences.cn: 他患有哮喘病，经不起高温和潮湿。

sentences.en: Clearly, the police cannot break the law in order to enforce it.
sentences.cn: 显然，警方不能为了执法而犯法。

sentences.en: Doctors cannot be bothered to explain what they do.
sentences.cn: 医生们才懒得解释他们所做的事情。

sentences.en: He cannot be allowed to dictate what can and cannot be inspected.
sentences.cn: 什么能检查，什么不能检查不能由他说了算。

sentences.en: If you cannot do it, I will understand.
sentences.cn: 如果你不能做这件事，我可以谅解。

sentences.en: More than a quarter of seven year-olds cannot add up properly.
sentences.cn: 7岁的孩子中1/4以上都不会正确地做加法运算。

sentences.en: Most people here cannot borrow from banks because they lack collateral.
sentences.cn: 由于拿不出东西作为抵押，这里大部分人无法从银行贷款。

sentences.en: Often a patient cannot snap out of their negativity that easily.
sentences.cn: 病人常常不能那么容易就打消掉消极的情绪。

sentences.en: Pythons kill by tightening their coils so that their victim cannot breathe.
sentences.cn: 大蟒蛇紧紧盘绕猎物使之无法呼吸，从而杀死猎物。

sentences.en: Some animal and plant species cannot accommodate to the rapidly changing cond-itions.
sentences.cn: 某些种类的动植物不能适应迅速变化的环境。

sentences.en: The more recent conifer plantations cannot yet compare with the old woodlands.
sentences.cn: 年代较近的针叶树林场还比不上年代久远的林场。

sentences.en: The worms cannot be seen by the naked eye.
sentences.cn: 这些虫子用肉眼看不见。

sentences.en: This magnificent church cannot fail to stop you in your tracks.
sentences.cn: 这座宏伟的教堂一定会让你止步赞叹。

sentences.en: You cannot chuck money away on little luxuries like that.
sentences.cn: 你不该把钱浪费在那种小奢侈品上。

sentences.en: You cannot expect to like all the people you will work with.
sentences.cn: 不要指望你会喜欢所有和你共事的人。

sentences.en: You cannot live in a cocoon and overlook these facts.
sentences.cn: 你不能自己缩在套子里而忽略这些事实。

phrases.tran_cn: 决不会太…；怎样…也不过分；越…越好
